name: cool cactus game lawl
description:
a stupid little cactus-flavored platformer i made in 24 hours to prove that i could.

YOU are a cactus, and YOU hate balloons. rip and tear, until it is done.

CONTROLS:

arrow keys do da scmoovin

z key does da jumpan

r key does da restartan

num 5 skips the level (BUT THAT WOULD BE CHEATING SO DONT DO DAT)

for cactusjam
